wordpressPost.title: Comfort Hotel Xpress + Øyafestivalen = TRUE
wordpressPost.excerpt: Ready for some really awesome news? Following up lasts years’ success, we are so very excited to be the only hotel in Oslo to offer a hotel deal including tickets to Øyafestivalen 2012. We only have a limited number of passes, and the only way you can book is by sending an email to festival@choice.no. […]
wordpressPost.content:
Ready for some really awesome news?

Following up lasts years’ success, we are so very excited to be the only hotel in Oslo to offer a hotel deal including tickets to Øyafestivalen 2012.
We only have a limited number of passes, and the only way you can book is by sending an email to festival@choice.no.

And the price? Not bad at all our friends!

NOK 7700,- including 2 Week Passes and double room Aug 7th-12th (Tuesday-Sunday).

NOK 5500,- including 1 Week Pass and single room Aug 7th-12th (Tuesday-Sunday)

Book your hotel deal by sending an email to festival@choice.no (your booking is confirmed when you receive your confirmation number)
PS: Check-out Sunday is 6pm… You’re welcome!
